title: Stop bushfires
creator_credit: Movietonenews, Frank Killian and Syd Wood
brief_description: Illustrates the devastation caused by bushfires and explains how to reduce fire danger around the bush and the precautions to take under threat of fire. Commentator: David Low
description: Illustrates the devastation caused by bushfires and explains how to reduce fire danger around the bush and the precautions to take under threat of fire. Commentator: David Low
